long_description: Don't let snow stop your fun! The Burley We! Ski kit converts your Burley trailer for cross-country skiing, skate skiing or snowshoeing adventures. A comfy, padded hip harness attaches to the Burley trailer by way of adjustable, lightweight tow bars. Smooth-gliding skis attach to the wheel axle with a push button system. Please note: compatible with 2007 and newer Burley D'Lite, D'Lite ST, Solo, Solo ST, Encore, 2008 and newer Cub and Tail Wagon, 2009 and newer Nomad and Flatbed trailers.
short_description: Don't let snow stop your fun! The Burley We! Ski kit converts your Burley trailer for cross-country skiing, skate skiing or snowshoeing adventures.
